summary.title: Online Payments Processing Platform
summary.description:
This threat model has been provided by the OWASP Threat Model Cookbook:
threat-model-cookbook/Flow Diagram/payment

text.text:
Demo threat model for an online Payments Processing Platform
provided by the OWASP Threat Model Cookbook:
threat-model-cookbook/Flow Diagram/payment

data.name:
Demo threat model for an online Payments Processing Platform
provided by the OWASP Threat Model Cookbook:
threat-model-cookbook/Flow Diagram/payment

threats.title: Authentication Data Intercepted
threats.description: Customer actor provides authentication credentials over potentially unencrypted channels to the Customer Client. This can lead to spoofing if intercepted.
threats.mitigation: Enforce end-to-end encryption (e.g., HTTPS/TLS 1.3) for all authentication flows and implement multi-factor authentication (MFA).

threats.title: Sensitive Data Exposure
threats.description: Customer actor communicates with Customer Client over public networks without encryption, exposing sensitive data to potential disclosure.
threats.mitigation: Ensure all communication between Customer and Customer Client is encrypted using strong protocols like TLS 1.3.

threats.title: Unencrypted Communication with External Services
threats.description: Customer Client communicates with external services (Stripe) without encryption, increasing risk of data tampering or interception.
threats.mitigation: Enforce TLS 1.2+ for all external API communications and validate server certificates.

threats.title: Lack of Non-Repudiation Controls
threats.description: Customer Client handles payment-related data but lacks sufficient logging or audit capabilities, enabling repudiation of actions.
threats.mitigation: Implement comprehensive audit logging for all payment-related operations and ensure logs are immutable and centrally stored.

labelText.text:
(1) Customer logs into
the merchant site

data.name:
(1) Customer logs into
the merchant site

threats.title: Unencrypted Authentication Flow
threats.description: Flow from Customer to Customer Client for login is not encrypted, exposing credentials to interception on public or untrusted networks.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all authentication flows and implement certificate pinning where applicable.

labelText.text:
(2) Customer proceeds to payment page
to make a purchase

data.name:
(2) Customer proceeds to payment page
to make a purchase

threats.title: Unencrypted Payment Initiation Flow
threats.description: Flow from Customer to Customer Client for payment initiation is not encrypted, exposing transaction details to interception.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all transaction-related flows and implement secure session management.

labelText.text:
(7) Customer provides card details
and finalizes payment

data.name:
(7) Customer provides card details
and finalizes payment

threats.title: Unencrypted Card Details Entry
threats.description: Flow from Customer to Customer Client for card details entry is not encrypted, exposing sensitive payment data.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 and use secure input fields with client-side validation and masking.

labelText.text:
(3) Customer Client sends order intent
including order amount
(6) Return PaymentIntent to
the Customer Client

data.name:
(3) Customer Client sends order intent
including order amount
(6) Return PaymentIntent to
the Customer Client

threats.title: Unencrypted Order Intent Exchange
threats.description: Bidirectional flow between Customer Client and Merchant Web Server lacks encryption, exposing order data to interception.
threats.mitigation: Enforce mutual TLS (mTLS) authentication and encryption for all internal API communications.

threats.title: Unencrypted Payment Attempt Flow
threats.description: Flow from Customer Client to Stripe API service for payment attempt is not encrypted, exposing transaction data.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all payment processing communications and validate API responses.

threats.title: Unencrypted Payment Response Flow
threats.description: Flow from Stripe Payment Service to Stripe API service for payment response is not encrypted, exposing transaction status.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all internal service communications and implement message authentication codes (MACs).

threats.title: Unencrypted Payment Status Return
threats.description: Flow from Stripe API service to Customer Client for payment status is not encrypted, exposing sensitive transaction data.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all client-facing communications and implement secure session tokens.

threats.title: Unencrypted Card Confirmation Flow
threats.description: Flow from Customer Client to Stripe API service for card confirmation is not encrypted, exposing payment credentials.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 and use secure tokenization for card data handling.

threats.title: Unencrypted Payment Intent Return
threats.description: Flow from Stripe API service to Merchant Web Server for payment intent return is not encrypted, exposing transaction data.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all merchant-facing communications and implement secure session tokens.

labelText.text:
(4) Merchant sends order information
inc amount and currency

data.name:
(4) Merchant sends order information
inc amount and currency

threats.title: Unencrypted Order Information Flow
threats.description: Flow from Merchant Web Server to Stripe API service for order information is not encrypted, exposing transaction data.
threats.mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS 1.3 for all merchant-to-payment service communications and implement secure session tokens.

threats.title: Unencrypted Communication with External Services
threats.description: Merchant Web Server communicates with external services without encryption, increasing risk of data tampering or interception.
threats.mitigation: Enforce TLS 1.2+ for all external API communications and validate server certificates.

threats.title: Lack of Non-Repudiation Controls
threats.description: Merchant Web Server handles payment-related data but lacks sufficient logging or audit capabilities, enabling repudiation of actions.
threats.mitigation: Implement comprehensive audit logging for all payment-related operations and ensure logs are immutable and centrally stored.

threats.title: Unencrypted Communication with External Clients
threats.description: Stripe API service communicates with external clients without encryption, increasing risk of data tampering or interception.
threats.mitigation: Enforce TLS 1.2+ for all external API communications and validate client certificates.

threats.title: Lack of Non-Repudiation Controls
threats.description: Stripe API service handles payment-related data but lacks sufficient logging or audit capabilities, enabling repudiation of actions.
threats.mitigation: Implement comprehensive audit logging for all payment-related operations and ensure logs are immutable and centrally stored.

threats.title: Unencrypted Communication with External Services
threats.description: Stripe Payment Service communicates with external services without encryption, increasing risk of data tampering or interception.
threats.mitigation: Enforce TLS 1.2+ for all external API communications and validate server certificates.

threats.title: Lack of Non-Repudiation Controls
threats.description: Stripe Payment Service handles payment-related data but lacks sufficient logging or audit capabilities, enabling repudiation of actions.
threats.mitigation: Implement comprehensive audit logging for all payment-related operations and ensure logs are immutable and centrally stored.
